augmented_topic: Hobbies and Free Time (Science Fiction Theme)
objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Science Fiction lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about hobbies and free time using expert register
Students create original scifi themed content about hobbies and free time in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using expert register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in expert register within scifi theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with technology
hobbies and free time with innovation
hobbies and free time with futuristic

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
